scripts.setup-widgets: ( cd tns-core-modules-widgets && sh build.sh ) && npm run dev-link-tns-core-modules-widgets
scripts.setup: npm run dev-link-tns-platform-declarations && npm run dev-link-tns-core-modules && npm run dev-link-tests && npm run dev-link-apps && npm run dev-link-e2e-modal
scripts.ci: tsc && npm run tslint && npm run ci-apps && npm run ci-e2e && npm run ci-tests
scripts.ci-e2e: cd e2e && cd modal-navigation && npm i ../../tns-core-modules ../../tns-platform-declarations --save
scripts.dev-tsc-all: npm run dev-tsc-tns-platform-declarations && npm run tsc && npm run dev-tsc-tests && npm run dev-tsc-apps && && npm run dev-tsc-e2e
scripts.dev-link-tns-core-modules-widgets: (cd tns-core-modules-widgets/dist/package && npm link) && (cd tns-core-modules && npm i ../tns-core-modules-widgets/dist/package --save)
scripts.dev-link-tests: cd tests && npm link tns-platform-declarations && npm link tns-core-modules
scripts.dev-link-apps: cd apps && npm link tns-platform-declarations && npm link tns-core-modules
scripts.dev-link-e2e-modal: cd e2e && cd modal-navigation && npm link tns-platform-declarations && npm link tns-core-modules
scripts.dev-declarations: npm run setup && rm -rf tns-platform-declarations/ios/objc* && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH=$PWD/tns-platform-declarations/ios/objc tns build ios --path tests
scripts.test: npm run test-android && npm run test-ios
scripts.pretest: npm run setup && npm run tsc
scripts.test-watch-android: npm run pretest && concurrently --kill-others "npm run tsc-tiw" "tns livesync android --path tests --watch"
scripts.test-watch-ios: npm run pretest && concurrently --kill-others "npm run tsc-tiw" "tns livesync ios --path tests --watch"
scripts.prepublish:
echo "Development reminder for setup
  - tns-core-modules: npm run setup
  - tns-core-modules-widgets: npm run setup-widgets
"
scripts.dev-typedoc: npm run typedoc && cd bin/dist/apiref && npx http-server
scripts.madge-ios: tsc --skipLibCheck && tns prepare ios --path tests && madge --circular tests/platforms/ios/tests/app/tns_modules/tns-core-modules
scripts.madge-ios-image: tsc --skipLibCheck && tns prepare ios --path tests && madge --image graph-tests-ios.svg tests/platforms/ios/tests/app/tns_modules/tns-core-modules
scripts.madge-android: tsc --skipLibCheck && tns prepare android --path tests && madge --circular tests/platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/app/tns_modules/tns-core-modules
scripts.madge-android-image: tsc --skipLibCheck && tns prepare android --path tests && madge --image graph-tests-android.svg tests/platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/app/tns_modules/tns-core-modules
